section.section: In this section, "home health care services" means medical or nonmedical services provided to ill, disabled, or infirm individuals in their residences.

"Home health care services" includes:
homemaker services;
assistance with activities of daily living; and
respite care services.

text.section: Coverage for home health care services may be applied to the coverage for other benefits provided in the policy or certificate of long-term care insurance when determining maximum coverage under the terms of the policy or certificate.
